1.name: Spellbound
1.description: A psychiatrist protects the identity of an amnesia patient accused of murder while attempting to recover his memory.

2.name: Mildred Pierce
2.description: A hard-working mother inches towards disaster as she divorces her husband and starts a successful restaurant business to support her spoiled daughter.

3.name: The Picture of Dorian Gray
3.description: A corrupt young man somehow keeps his youthful beauty, but a special painting gradually reveals his inner ugliness to all.

4.name: Jungle Queen
4.description: A young girl journeys to Africa to find her father, an explorer who vanished in the jungle.

5.name: Brief Encounter
5.description: Meeting a stranger in a railway station, a woman is tempted to cheat on her husband.

6.name: Eve Knew Her Apples
6.description: Radio singing star, Eve Porter, wants a vacation during her show's summer hiatus, but her manager and press have booked her for additional work. She refuses and goes to Las Vegas. When she ...                See full summary »

7.name: The Body Snatcher
7.description: A ruthless doctor and his young prize student find themselves continually harassed by their murderous supplier of illegal cadavers.

8.name: Dangerous Partners
8.description: After surviving a plane crash, a couple tries to find out why one of the passengers was carrying four wills for a million dollars, with each one naming him as the beneficiary.

9.name: The Lost Weekend
9.description: The desperate life of a chronic alcoholic is followed through a four-day drinking bout.

10.name: Dead of Night
10.description: Architect Walter Craig (Mervyn Johns) senses impending doom as his half-remembered recurring dream turns into reality. The guests at the country house encourage him to stay as they take turns telling supernatural tales.

11.name: And Then There Were None
11.description: Seven guests, a newly hired personal secretary and two staff are gathered on an isolated island by an absent host and someone begins killing them off one by one. They work together to determine who the killer is. Could it be one of them?

12.name: Leave Her to Heaven
12.description: A writer falls in love with a young socialite and they're soon married. But her obsessive love for him threatens to be the undoing of them both, and everyone else around them.

13.name: Bewitched
13.description: A young woman has two distinct personalities, one of whom is evil and constantly gets her in trouble.

14.name: They Were Expendable
14.description: The PT boat unit Motor Torpedo Boat Squadron Three defends the Philippines from Japanese invasion during World War II.

15.name: Caesar and Cleopatra
15.description: At the height of the Roman Civil War, a young Cleopatra meets a middle-aged Julius Caesar, who teaches her how to rule Egypt.

16.name: Scarlet Street
16.description: When a man in mid-life crisis befriends a young woman, her venal fiancé persuades her to con him out of the fortune they mistakenly assume he possesses.

17.name: Fallen Angel
17.description: A slick con man arrives in a small town looking to make some money, but soon gets more than he bargained for.

18.name: Detour
18.description: Chance events trap hitch-hiker Al Roberts in a tightening net of film noir trouble.

19.name: Roma città aperta
19.description: During the Nazi occupation of Rome in 1944, the Resistance leader, Giorgio Manfredi, is chased by the Nazis as he seeks refuge and a way to escape.

20.name: Les enfants du paradis
20.description: The theatrical life of a beautiful courtesan and the four men who love her.

21.name: House of Dracula
21.description: Count Dracula and the Wolf Man seek cures for their afflictions; a hunchbacked woman, a mad scientist and Frankenstein's Monster have their own troubles.

22.name: Anchors Aweigh
22.description: Two sailors, one naive, the other experienced in the ways of the world, on liberty in Los Angeles, is the setting for this movie musical.

23.name: Blithe Spirit
23.description: Charles (Sir Rex Harrison) and his second wife, Ruth (Constance Cummings), are haunted by the spirit of his first wife, Elvira (Kay Hammond). Medium Madame Arcati (Dame Margaret Rutherford) tries to help things out by contacting the ghost.

24.name: The Bells of St. Mary's
24.description: At a big city Catholic school, Father O'Malley and Sister Benedict indulge in friendly rivalry, and succeed in extending the school through the gift of a building.

25.name: A Tree Grows in Brooklyn
25.description: Encouraged by her idealistic if luckless father, a bright and imaginative young woman comes of age in a Brooklyn tenement during the early 1900s.

26.name: State Fair
26.description: The Frake family attends the annual Iowa State Fair; each member of the clan has their own reason for doing so.

27.name: She Went to the Races
27.description: Scientists have developed a method for winning at the track. Lovely Ava is a horse owner interest to a desperate gambler.

28.name: A Walk in the Sun
28.description: During WWII, a platoon of American soldiers trudge through the Italian countryside in search of a bridge they have been ordered to blow up, encountering danger and destruction along the way.

29.name: Ziegfeld Follies
29.description: The late, great impresario Florenz Ziegfeld Jr. looks down from Heaven and ordains a new revue in his grand old style.

30.name: The House of Fear
30.description: Sherlock Holmes investigates a series of deaths at a castle with each foretold by the delivery of orange pips to the victims.

31.name: I Know Where I'm Going!
31.description: A young Englishwoman goes to the Hebrides to marry her older, wealthier fiancé. When the weather keeps them separated on different islands, she begins to have second thoughts.

32.name: The Southerner
32.description: The life of the poor Tucker family, that worked as cotton pluggers and decided to get their own ground, but nature is against them.

33.name: The Woman in Green
33.description: Sherlock Holmes investigates when young women around London turn up murdered, each with a finger severed. Scotland Yard suspects a madman, but Holmes believes the killings to be part of a diabolical plot.

34.name: Isle of the Dead
34.description: On a Greek island during the 1912 war, several people are trapped by quarantine for the plague. If that isn't enough worry, one of the people, a superstitious old peasant woman, suspects ...                See full summary »

35.name: Hangover Square
35.description: A promising classical musician finds his life poisoned by a music hall dancer -- and by the strange gaps in his memory.

36.name: Flame of Barbary Coast
36.description: Duke falls for Flaxen in the Barbary Coast in turn-of-the-century San Francisco. He loses money to crooked gambler Tito, goes home and PL: learns to gamble, and returns. After he makes a ...                See full summary »

37.name: The Enchanted Cottage
37.description: A homely maid and a scarred ex-GI meet at the cottage where she works and where he was to spend his honeymoon prior to his accident. The two develop a bond and agree to marry, more out of ...                See full summary »

38.name: The Clock
38.description: In 1945, during a 48-hour leave, a soldier accidentally meets a girl at Pennsylvania Station and spends his leave with her, eventually falling in love with the lovely New Yorker.

39.name: Tarzan and the Amazons
39.description: A group of archaeologists asks Tarzan to help them find an ancient city in a hidden valley of women. He refuses, but Boy is tricked into doing the job. The queen of the women asks Tarzan to help them.

40.name: Christmas in Connecticut
40.description: A food writer who has lied about being the perfect housewife must try to cover her deception when her boss and a returning war hero invite themselves to her home for a traditional family Christmas.

41.name: Story of G.I. Joe
41.description: During WW2, Pulitzer prize winner and war correspondent Ernie Pyle joins the army and writes articles about his comrades in his daily columns.

42.name: Conflict
42.description: An engineer trapped in an unhappy marriage murders his wife in the hope of marrying her younger sister.

43.name: Blood on the Sun
43.description: A dedicated American reporter in 1930s Japan is determined to expose that government's plan for world domination.

44.name: Confidential Agent
44.description: During the Spanish Civil War, a republican courier travels to England to try and buy coal. He meets with an amount of local hostility, while his life is at risk from those on the fascist ...                See full summary »

45.name: Back to Bataan
45.description: In 1942, after the fall of the Philippines to the Japanese, U.S. Army Col. Joseph Madden stays behind to organize the local resistance against the Japanese invaders.

46.name: Rhapsody in Blue
46.description: George Gershwin is a driven composer whose need to succeed destroys his relationship with singer Julie Adams and socialite Christine Gilbert.

47.name: Along Came Jones
47.description: A good-natured saddle tramp traveling with his sidekick is mistaken for a ruthless outlaw with a price on his head.

48.name: The Bullfighters
48.description: Bumbling detective Stan Laurel disguises himself as a famous matador in order to hide from the vengeful Richard K. Muldoon, who spent time in prison on Stan's bogus testimony.

49.name: Objective, Burma!
49.description: A platoon of special ops are tasked to parachute into the remote Burmese jungle and destroy a strategic Japanese radar station, but getting out isn't as easy.

50.name: The Spanish Main
50.description: After being wronged by the Caribbean authorities, a Dutch captain turns pirate to wage war.
